message: Let's split fairly, Bob. A 55/45 split seems reasonable for us to end this quickly.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I think a 60/40 split is more reflective of the situation.  Time is money, after all.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical outcome. I'm willing to accept this to avoid further losses due to inflation.
